de.tobiasroeser.lambdatest.testng

Class FreeSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tobiasroeser.lambdatest.generic.FreeSpecBase
      • de.tobiasroeser.lambdatest.testng.FreeSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LambdaTest

    public class FreeSpec
extends FreeSpecBase
implements LambdaTest

    Inherit from this class to create a new TestNG test suite and use the test(java.lang.String, de.tobiasroeser.lambdatest.RunnableWithException) method to add test cases.

    It provides the following methods:

    • test(String, RunnableWithException) to declare a new test case

    • FreeSpecBase.intercept(Class, RunnableWithException) and FreeSpecBase.intercept(Class, String, RunnableWithException) to intercept and assert expected exceptions.

    • pending() to mark a test case as pending. All code before it’s usage including asserts will be executed, but code after it will be skipped. Thus you can mark a test also as work-in-progress.

    TODO: example

      • setExpectFailFast

        public void setExpectFailFast(boolean failFast)
        Description copied from interface: LambdaTest

        If true, the first failed assertion will also fail the test. If false, the test runs as long as possible, potentially collection multipe failed assertions.

        Specified by:
        setExpectFailFast in interface LambdaTest
        Overrides:
        setExpectFailFast in class FreeSpecBase
        Parameters:
        failFast - If true, to fail fast.

      • test

        public void test(String name,
                 RunnableWithException testCase)

        Adds a test to the test suite.

        Overrides:
        test in class FreeSpecBase
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new test.
        testCase - The test case. It should return when it is successful, else it should throw an exception. Exceptions of type TestException which are typically thrown by Assert.assertXXX methods (e.g. Assert.assertEquals(String, String)) are specially recognized by TestNG.

      • pending

        public void pending()

        Marks the test as pending. Instructions after <code>pending()</code> will not be executed and TestNG marks the test as skipped.

        Specified by:
        pending in interface LambdaTest

      • pending

        public void pending(String reason)

        Marks the test as pending and uses the given reason as message. Instructions after pending() will not be executed and TestNG marks the test as skipped.

        Specified by:
        pending in interface LambdaTest
